name: part_008
file: tmp_【#ときのそら５周年記念】想いをこめて届ける3D配信！ [TjGC7Jzc5ns]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: The members decide to line up and perform a 'Choo Choo TRAIN' style dance move together.
They successfully perform the move and reflect on their shared history and memories over the past five years.
Sora transitions the stream to announce special merchandise for her 5th anniversary.
Sora introduces the random acrylic keyholders featuring illustrations by Ikaki-sensei.
Sora presents a T-shirt featuring a stylized crayfish design by Kase-san.
Sora shows off the fluffy Nun-nun plushie and the members play with their mascot plushies.

subtitles.original: 何しに行くの、次？
subtitles.english: What are we doing next?

subtitles.original: ありさ、まだ、まだ時間あるからさ
subtitles.english: Wait, we still have time.

subtitles.original: あずきちゃん、あずきちゃん、なんか...
subtitles.english: AZKi-chan, AZKi-chan, how about...

subtitles.original: え、何？
subtitles.english: Eh, what?

subtitles.original: 何でもいいよ、ほら
subtitles.english: Anything is fine, look.

subtitles.original: ねえ、ちょっとみんな、まっすぐ並ぼうよ
subtitles.english: Hey, let's all line up straight.

subtitles.original: あ、縦に、縦に？
subtitles.english: Ah, in a column? Vertically?

subtitles.original: あ、じゃあじゃあ、こう、こう、このまま、このまま
subtitles.english: Ah, then, like this, like this, just as we are.

subtitles.original: あ、じゃあ、一番、一番前行くわ、私
subtitles.english: Ah, then I'll go to the very front.

subtitles.original: で、中腰になる、私がちょっと
subtitles.english: And I'll crouch a bit.

subtitles.original: おお、みんな見える？
subtitles.english: Oh, can you all see?

subtitles.original: あ、いいじゃん、これ
subtitles.english: Ah, this is great!

subtitles.original: いい感じ、いい感じ
subtitles.english: Looking good, looking good.

subtitles.original: 小さいゆえに、小さいのになんで後ろなんだ、お前！
subtitles.english: Being small... why are you in the back when you're small?!

subtitles.original: これ、いいじゃないですか
subtitles.english: This is pretty good, isn't it?

subtitles.original: あ、いいよいいよ、いいよ
subtitles.english: Ah, nice, nice, nice!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: あ、これ、チューチュートレインできるんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Ah, can't we do Choo Choo TRAIN with this?

subtitles.original: そうそうそうそう
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.

subtitles.original: 行くよ、せーの！
subtitles.english: Here we go, one, two!

subtitles.original: ぐるぐる、ぐるぐる
subtitles.english: Spin, spin, spin, spin.

subtitles.original: あ、きれい、きれい、きれい！
subtitles.english: Ah, so beautiful, beautiful, beautiful!

subtitles.original: いい感じ、これ、上手！
subtitles.english: Looking good, we're good at this!

subtitles.original: ウヒョーイ！
subtitles.english: Wooohooo!

subtitles.original: 何これ、何の会、何の会、これ
subtitles.english: What's this? What kind of gathering is this?

subtitles.original: 懐かしい、懐かしい、こんなこともやったな
subtitles.english: How nostalgic, nostalgic. We used to do stuff like this.

subtitles.original: やったね、やった。強固な、強固にされてる
subtitles.english: We did it! We did it. Our bond is strengthened.

subtitles.original: やばい、この5年でこんなこといっぱいしたな
subtitles.english: Wow, we've done so many things like this in these 5 years.

subtitles.original: そうだね、いろいろあったね、ねえ
subtitles.english: Right, so much has happened.

subtitles.original: はい、というわけで、そらちゃんが何か告知したいことがあると...
subtitles.english: Alright, and with that, Sora-chan has something to announce...

subtitles.original: あ、そうなんです、告知！
subtitles.english: Ah, that's right, an announcement!

subtitles.original: え、何、何ですか、何ですか？
subtitles.english: Eh, what? What is it? What is it?

subtitles.original: なんと今日はですね、今回5周年を記念して...
subtitles.english: Well, today, to commemorate the 5th anniversary...

subtitles.original: おお、グッズをご用意してあります！
subtitles.english: Oh, we have some merchandise prepared!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 画像、画像！
subtitles.english: The image, show the image!

subtitles.original: どれどれ、どれどれ？
subtitles.english: Let's see, let's see.

subtitles.original: はい、今回のグッズはこちらです！
subtitles.english: Yes, here is the merchandise!

subtitles.original: ああ、かわいい、かわいい！
subtitles.english: Ah, so cute, so cute!

subtitles.original: 活動5周年記念ということでですね、この...
subtitles.english: Since it's the 5th anniversary of my activities...

subtitles.original: 記念ボイス1種類と記念グッズ3種類をちょっとご用意しております
subtitles.english: We've prepared one memorial voice and three memorial items.

subtitles.original: わーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 1つずつ、ちょっと見ていこうかなと思います。まずは1つ目はこちら！
subtitles.english: Let's take a look at them one by one. First, here's the first one!

subtitles.original: お、お！
subtitles.english: Oh, oh!

subtitles.original: ランダムアクリルキーホルダー！
subtitles.english: Random Acrylic Keyholder!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 今回はですね、イラスト、いかき先生に描いていただきまして
subtitles.english: This time, the illustration was drawn by Ikaki-sensei.

subtitles.original: いかき先生、懐かしい！
subtitles.english: Ikaki-sensei, how nostalgic!

subtitles.original: あの、初期からずっと私の、ね、最初のなんか...
subtitles.english: Um, they've been helping me since the very beginning...

subtitles.original: お世話になった、お世話になった方なんですけど
subtitles.english: They're someone who really looked after me back then.

subtitles.original: その方にイラストを描いていただきました。どれも可愛いくて
subtitles.english: I had them draw the illustrations. They're all so cute.

subtitles.original: ぜひ、ぜひみんな見てもらえると嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: I'd be so happy if everyone could take a look!

subtitles.original: 見て、可愛い！
subtitles.english: Look, they're cute!

subtitles.original: そして次が、こちら！
subtitles.english: And next is this one!

subtitles.original: お、Tシャツ！
subtitles.english: Oh, a T-shirt!

subtitles.original: ザリガニTシャツで、イラストはかせさんという方に描いていただきました
subtitles.english: It's a crayfish T-shirt, and the illustration was by Kase-san.

subtitles.original: ザリガニではない、ザリガニではない、これ、ザリガニじゃん！
subtitles.english: It's not a crayfish... It's totally a crayfish!

subtitles.original: でも、でも、おしゃれかもしれない
subtitles.english: But, but it might actually be stylish.

subtitles.original: おしゃれだよ、すごいおしゃれ。可愛い、かっこいい
subtitles.english: It is stylish, very stylish. Cute and cool.

subtitles.original: なんだ、どんぐりが3つ連なってるようにしか...
subtitles.english: Wait, it just looks like three acorns lined up...

subtitles.original: 違う、あれは、違う、あれは顔と、胴体と...
subtitles.english: No, those are... no, that's the face, the body, and...

subtitles.original: 尻尾。ハサミがハートになってて、ハサミ、ハサミなんだよ
subtitles.english: The tail. The claws are shaped like hearts. They're claws!

subtitles.original: あ、触角じゃないんだ、あれは。ハサミなんだ
subtitles.english: Ah, those aren't antennae? They're claws.

subtitles.original: どう見てもザリガニやろ！ お前ら毒されすぎだ！
subtitles.english: No matter how you look at it, it's a crayfish! You're too biased!

subtitles.original: だから、なんか、ちょっとおしゃれにしようかなと思って...
subtitles.english: So, I thought I'd make it a little stylish...

subtitles.original: おしゃれ、おしゃれです。夏休みの自由研究してる時に着たい
subtitles.english: It is stylish. I'd wear it during my summer research project.

subtitles.original: フォローしてるように見えてフォローしてない、それ！ 気にしないで、そらちゃん
subtitles.english: You sound like you're helping but you're not! Don't mind her, Sora-chan.

subtitles.original: はい、次。次行きます。次はこちらです！
subtitles.english: Alright, next. Moving on. Here is the next one!

subtitles.original: ああ、可愛い！ ぬんぬん、ぬんぬん、可愛い！
subtitles.english: Ah, so cute! Nun-nun, Nun-nun, so cute!

subtitles.original: 可愛いでしょう。なんか、もふもふなものが作りたいなと思って...
subtitles.english: It's cute, right? I wanted to make something fluffy...

subtitles.original: いいじゃん。あれ？ もしかして、なんか見つけた様子？
subtitles.english: It's nice. Wait, did you find something?

subtitles.original: あれ？ もしかして、あんきも？！
subtitles.english: Wait, could it be... Ankimo?!

subtitles.original: うわー、いつの間にか出ている！ 可愛い、そらちゃん！
subtitles.english: Whoa, he's out already! So cute, Sora-chan!

subtitles.original: あ、ここには、ここには、なんかぬんぬん、ぬんぬん...
subtitles.english: Ah, over here, over here, some Nun-nun, Nun-nun...

subtitles.original: あんきもだ、あんきもが嫉妬してる！
subtitles.english: It's Ankimo! Ankimo is jealous!

subtitles.original: 可愛い、あんきももいるよ。どっちも可愛いよ
subtitles.english: So cute, Ankimo is here too. Both are cute.

subtitles.original: 浮いてる、ぬんぬん、浮いているけど、よろしくね！
subtitles.english: Nun-nun is floating, but please take care of them!

subtitles.original: そらちゃん、見て、買ってほしそうだよ、これ
subtitles.english: Sora-chan, look, they look like they want to be bought.

subtitles.original: マジ、あんきも欲しい、あんきも欲しい、あんきも欲しい！
subtitles.english: Seriously, I want Ankimo, I want Ankimo, I want Ankimo!

subtitles.original: 大人気、みこち、ほら、あ、やった、くれた！
subtitles.english: So popular! Mikochi, look, ah, nice, she gave it to me!

subtitles.original: うわー、やったー！ うわー、見て、あんきも！
subtitles.english: Whoa, yay! Whoa, look, Ankimo!

subtitles.original: 可愛い、今日の主役、ぬんぬん！
subtitles.english: So cute, today's star, Nun-nun!

subtitles.original: ぬんぬん！
subtitles.english: Nun-nun!
